marlin::RunTimeProcessor Class Reference

Simple processor which allows for an eay relation bwetween runnumbers and runtime and therefore a convenient browsing of the database. More...

Detailed Description

Simple processor which allows for an eay relation bwetween runnumbers and runtime and therefore a convenient browsing of the database.
